original_title: Keselwaththa Shooting: Police deploy 03 teams to Investigate
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The police have launched a comprehensive investigation into the shooting incident that occurred in Keselwaththa, where one person lost their life on Sunday (31).
The victim, a 20-year-old resident of Colombo 12, was fatally shot, and the police have not yet determined the cause of the shooting.
It was reported that three teams have been deployed to probe the incident and apprehend the suspects involved.
